name: Seven Sages (itch)
description:
Seven Sages is a retro-style puzzler where the player must decipher coded messages and solve riddles in order to reveal the narrative of the game. You play a historian who has just inherited a strange collection of sealed books from his dead grandfather. With only a small library of books, a desk to write notes, and your own brain, you must find a way to unlock your grandfather's sealed books and uncover their secrets.

The game also features short stories from various independent writers. Be sure to check them out!
